Warning.First: REFERENCE IS MANDATORY AND SHOULD BE ENTERED IN THE INFO FIELD WHEN YOU SEND A PAYMENT CRYPTO CAPITAL

Labels.Ready: Due to the specifics of our payment partner’s operations, we cannot guarantee payment processing time. Currently, transaction processing may take 2 to 60 days.

SelectCountryNote.FirstText: If your country is not on the list, if means we are unable to receive a bank transfer for this country. Please check

Text.One: REFERENCE SHOULD BE ENTERED FIRST IN THE NARRATIVE OF THE SENDING BANK'S PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS, BEFORE ANY OTHER REFERENCES.
Text.Two: PLEASE SEND THE EXACT AMOUNT IN CURRENCY YOU APPLIED FOR (EXCLUDING BANK CHARGES) AND MAKE SURE YOUR PAYMENT DETAILS IS STATED CORRECTLY.
Text.Three: PAYMENTS FROM THIRD PARTIES WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED AND RETURNED BACK TO THE SENDER. PLEASE NOTE THAT BANK CHARGES FOR PAYMENT RETURN WILL BE DEDUCTED FROM THE AMOUNT.
Text.Four: CRYPTO SP.ZO.O is the payment processor for Crypto Capital Corp (Crypto Capital).

BankTransfer.Checkbox: I have double-checked all the risks and acknowledge that GOLDMINT.IO should not be responsible for the outcomes of my actions. It also concerns the risks of losses and lost profits in case of payment delays.

Crypto.Heading: Crypto Capital

Text.FirstText: Pay attention that each Crypto Capital account in each currency should be verified by GoldMint.io. You can proceed with unverified account as well, but the payment will be processed only after verification of your Crypto Capital account.
Text.SecondText: Please note that if the withdrawal currency differs from the currency of your Crypto Capital account? conversion fees may be applied.

Crypto.Checkbox: I have read, understood and agree with above mentioned policies.

PopUp.Heading: Attention
PopUp.Text:
How to verify a Crypto Capital account?

1. Take a screenshot of your Crypto Capital account with clearly visible account number. A separate screenshot is required for each Crypto Capital account.

2. Provide this screenshot to our support team via support@goldmint.io

Message.Remove: Do you want to remove account?

Placeholder.NameOnAccount: The name on this bank account must match this account
Placeholder.Address: The physical address of your bank's branch, including the country

Text.First: In order to use Goldmint application you should sign data processing agreement we have sent to your email.
Text.Second: If you have signed an agreement, please note that in particular cases processing could take a while. Please be patient, wait a few minutes and try to sign in.
Text.Third: If you have problems with signing this agreement, please contact our support team via

Labels.Provide: Provide a new password for your account

Text.Reset: To reset your password, enter the email address you use to sign in to GOLDMINT.IO. It can be your email address, an email address you use with one of the social networks, or any email address associated with your account.

Recovery.FirstLine: We've sent you an email containing a password recovery link. You will be able to reset your password by clicking the link within the next 24 hours. Please click on the button in your email.
Recovery.SecondLine: If you don't see the email, be sure to check the spam folder.

DefaultSection.Title: Identity verification
DefaultSection.Text: Complete verification to withdraw fiat funds and unlock account opportunities
DefaultSection.Note: Verification procedures is very simple and intuitive. We will only ask you to provide is some personal information and supporting documents.

WarningSection.Title: Advanced verification
WarningSection.Text: Unverified accounts cannot make any fiat operaions. You will be redirected to identity verification service.
WarningSection.TextPending: Advanced verification is still in progress. Please come back later or try to refresh this page. You will be able to repeat your verification in 30 minutes.

AgreementSection.Title: Sign agreement
AgreementSection.Text: Complete verification by signing Goldmint agreement. Agreement will be sent to your primary email address.
AgreementSection.TextPending: Agreement signing is still in progress. Please come back later or try to refresh this page.

ProofResidency.Heading: Proof of Residency
ProofResidency.Text: In order to verify your residency you need to send a request to our support team and attach one of the following documents dated within the past 60 days: gas bill, electric bill, cable bill, property tax bill, oil bill, home telephone bill, bank statement.

FormSection.Title: Basic Information
FormSection.NewAccountText: NEW ACCOUNT. Please submit the information below to apply for a basic account. Please use your full legal name as it exists on your government identification.
FormSection.Important: IMPORTANT: once submitted, all the information cannot be changed. Please ensure the spelling is correct.

FirstName.minLength: Name should be at least 2 symbols length

LastName.minLength: Name should be at least 2 symbols length

SecretKeySection.Title: Two-factor authentication
SecretKeySection.WarningText: Two-factor authentication (2FA) greatly increases security by requiring both your password and another form of authentication. Goldmint implements 2FA utilizing Google Authenticator. To enable this feature simply download Google Authenticator on your mobile device and scan the CPCode. Once you have linked the Authenticator with Bittrex, enter the 6 digit code provided.
SecretKeySection.Text: Please back up your secret key. Resetting two-factor authentication requires opening a support ticket and may take up to 7 days.
SecretKeySection.DisableWarning: If you want to turn off 2FA, input your account password and the six-digit code provided by the Google Authenticator app below, then click "Disable 2FA". Your account will be insecure and can be easily hacked.

NetworksSection.Title: Social Networks
NetworksSection.Text: You can sign in into app.goldmint.io with your Social Network account

Limits.Heading: Get an overview of your account opportunities

Text.Basic: Buy and sale Bitcoins in a few clicks using your Visa or Master Card.
Text.Verified: Extend your limits and enable more payment options by verifying your identity.

PaymentLimits.Heading: PAYMENT METHODS LIMITS
PaymentLimits.Text: Please note that each payment method has It’s own limits, BUT cumulative amount of payment method limits should not exceed total amount limits of your account type

MetaMask.Heading: What is Metamask?
MetaMask.Text: MetaMask is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Ethereum dApps right in your browser without running a full Ethereum node. Please, install the MetaMask add-on in Chrome, Firefox or Opera browser. Get Metamask
